name: TimeZooka
description:
Use the TimeZooka to defeat the enemies by making them too old or young! Use the objects around to refill your time! Become a child, adult or elder to open certain gates! Your time is your ammo, use it well!

Controllers:

  • WASD → Movement 
  • ←→↓↑ →   Movement
  • Left Click→ Age Shoot 
  • Right Click → De-age  Shoot
  • Click the X on the right top corner to open the Main Menu (resume, settings, restart, exit)

Credits:

  • Music & Sound Effects: Rosko#3445
  • Programming: renanruan#3958
  • Art: doodlenstein#6185 & stevend#7719
  • Management & Support: Feripei#4038
  • Game & Narrative design: stevend#7719
